00039   int newObject (char const * object_name,const int & section)
00040   {
00041     assert(o.size()<o.capacity());
00042     o.push_back(Object(object_name,section));
00043     assert(o.size()>0);
00044     return o.size()-1;
00045   }

00051   void initTransform (double * const t)
00052   {
00053     t[0]=0.0; t[1]=1.0; t[2]=0.0; t[3]=0.0; t[4]=0.0; t[5]=0.0;
00054     t[6]=0.0; t[7]=0.0; t[8]=1.0; t[9]=0.0; t[10]=0.0; t[11]=0.0;
00055   }

00088   int getNumContours (void) const
00089   {
00090     int sum = 0;
00091     for (c_o_iterator i = o.begin();i!=o.end();i++)
00092     {
00093       sum += i->getNumContours();
00094     }
00095     return sum;
00096   }
00097 
00101   int getNumRawPoints (void) const
00102   {
00103     int sum = 0;
00104     for (c_o_iterator i = o.begin();i!=o.end();i++)
00105     {
00106       sum += i->getNumRawPoints();
00107     }
00108     return sum;
00109   }

00116   c_l_iterator getLastContourFromObject (char const * const object_name)
00117   {
00118     int index = getMatchingObject(object_name);
00119     assert(index>=0);
00120     assert(index<static_cast<int>(o.size()));
00121     return o[index].getLastContour();
00122   }

00160   {
